mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, email, nickname, password, profile_picture) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{profile_picture})
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.title, p.author, TO_CHAR(p.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at_formatted FROM post p WHERE p.author = ( SELECT u.user_id FROM `user` u WHERE u.username = #{username} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_activity (user_id, post_id, activity_type) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{post_id}, #{activity_type});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND post_id = #{post_id} AND activity_type = #{activity_type};
